EmailTemplate.subject: Position Issues
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for your inquiry regarding your positions
For more information you can follow this FAQs LINK or
If you have a specific position issue that cannot be resolved via the FAQs
a. You can “open a case” and upload your print screens in the case. b. Or you can send the issue via email to support@stox.com Files can be .jpg, .png, .TIFF, .GIF
Please make sure that you state: a. Your position I.D. b. The TIC name of the product c. When the position was opened d. A brief description of the problem you are having e. Use the same email that you registered your Stox account f. State your “Username” g. In the title of the email you write “position issues”
Please do not “code lock” your files as, we will be unable to open them.
We wish you all the best with your investments Stox Support Team
